content: The Bull Governor's Spirit allows you to take the form of the bull and charge forward with your lava-infused halberd, dealing Scorch Damage to any enemies caught in your path. It's a strong move that is even further boosted by the equipped effect that increases any Scorch Damage you inflict on your foes.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bull_Governor_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Bull Governor Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Bull Governor Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
The Bull Governor's Spirit allows you to take the form of the bull and charge forward with your lava-infused halberd, dealing Scorch Damage to any enemies caught in your path. It's a strong move that is even further boosted by the equipped effect that increases any Scorch Damage you inflict on your foes.
